name: Counterstrike
effect:
:instant: Remove the Black cube from the selected \* [Unit](../units/index.md) card - that [unit](../units/index.md) is now able to perform a Retaliation Attack action again:

:empower: 0 ➣ \*:bronze:
:empower: 2 ➣ \*:bronze: or :silver:
:empower: 4 ➣ \*:bronze: or :silver: or :golden:

— OR —

:instant: +1 :empower:
